00049 class QicsCellStyle: public QicsStyle
00050 {
00051 public:
00058     enum QicsCellStyleProperty { Palette = 0,
00059                  BorderWidth,
00060                  BorderStyle,
00061                  BorderPen,
00062                  CellMargin,
00063                  Enabled,
00064                  Current,
00065                  Selected,       
00066                  ReadOnly,
00067                  Alignment,
00068                  TextFlags,
00069                  Font,
00070                  Cursor,
00071                  CellDisplayer,
00072                  Formatter,
00073                  Pixmap,
00074                  PixmapSpacing,
00075                  Validator,
00076                  Label,
00077                  MaxLength,
00078                  UserData,
00079                  LastProperty };
00080     
00081     
00092     QicsCellStyle(QicsGridType type, bool create_default = false,
00093           QWidget *template_widget = 0);
00094        
00098     inline void *getValue(QicsCellStyleProperty name) const
00099     { return QicsStyle::getValue((int)name); }
00103     inline void setValue(QicsCellStyleProperty name, const void *val) 
00104     { QicsStyle::setValue((int) name, val); }
00105 
00110     inline void clear(QicsCellStyleProperty prop)
00111     { QicsStyle::clear((int) prop); }
00112 
00113 protected:        
00120     static const QicsStylePropertyType myCellStyleTypeList[];
00121 };
